DOC.brief_title: Metabolomics Approach After Acute Intake Grumixama Juice
DOC.detailed_description: The grumixama sweet little cherry native South Southeast region Atlantic Forest Brazil rich phenolic compound , mainly anthocyanins ellagitannins . The objective study Investigate bioavailability main flavonoid , colonic transformation untargeted metabolite metabolomic approach follow acute intake grumixama juice human . Fifteen healthy subject consume grumixama juice single dose , urine plasma sample collect different time point 24 h period . The metabolite analyze LC-ESI-MSn , LC-Q-TOF plasma urine also analyze use untargeted metabolomic approach amino acid organic acid GCMS .
DOC.criteria: Not medical historical cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , thyroid and/or diabetes dysfunction Not alcohol addict , use vitamin supplement Not use kind medication affect digestion absorption food , smoker Not pregnant .
